data.text: @cv_cev @theAliceRoberts Can you explain why some countries forbid covid self tests. New Zealand.

@CharlesFazacker @theAliceRoberts The NHS has significantly more purchasing power than you do as an individual - so overall it will be cheaper. At point of use it will be free for the person who needs to access it, so we won't be excluding the poorest from taking "responsibility" for health choices / diagnosis.
@cv_cev @theAliceRoberts There's no such thing as free. Who do you actually want to pay for them?
